body.name: WAVLINK AC1200 WiFi Router Wireless Internet Router for Home, Dual Band Router 2.4GHz and 5GHz with 1000Mbps WAN/LAN Gigabit Ethernet Port, 4 x 5dBi Foldable Antennas, Supports Router Repeater AP Mode
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 4 mins
features: 【WiFi Router for Home】The WAVLINK AC1200 WiFi router features 802.11ac WiFi technology for faster speeds, more capacity and less network congestion. Works with all internet service providers, such as Comcast, Charter, AT&T, Verizon, Xfinity, Spectrum, RCN, Cox, CenturyLink, Frontier,etc.(A modem is required for most internet service providers).

【Dual Band WiFi Router】Dual band router is used to connect more wifi devices. The total network speed is around 1200 Mbps. 900Mbps in the 5GHz band and 300 Mbps in the 2.4GHz band. Simple tasks such as email or web browsing can be handled by the 2.4GHz band, while bandwidth-intensive tasks such as online gaming or 4K video streaming can be handled by the 5GHz band. More than 64-128 devices can be connected at the same time.

【Router/Repeater/AP Operating Modes】WAVLINK router supports Router Mode, Access Point and Repeater Modes. Router/AP Mode is ideal for converting wired networks into wireless networks, Repeater mode is used to boost WiFi signals and extend WiFi coverage of existing wireless networks.

【Stable WiFi Connections】This wireless wifi router supports wired connection of computers,game consoles, streaming players with 2 Gigabit LAN ports. 4 x 5dBi high-performance omni-directional and foldable antennas enhance the router's reception sensitivity and transmission capability, maximising WiFi range and greatly improving network performance. Enjoy safe and secure internet connections for you and your family, with WPA/WPA2 PSK mixed security and industry level password encryption.

【Easy to Setup】This wifi router is easy to set up and if you encounter any problems during the setup process please feel free to contact us📧. WAVLINK AC1200 WiFi Router comes with a 1-year warranty. 🛒Package includes: 1 x Wireless Router, 1 x RJ-45 Network Cable, 1 x DC 12V Power Adapter, 1 x Quick Installation Guide.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WAVLINK WiFi Router AC1200 Wireless Internet Router for Home WAVLINK AC1200 WiFi Rotuer works with all internet service providers. A modem is required for most internet service providers.

Strong Wi-Fi Signal, Strong Penetrability Dual-band 2.4GHz & 5GHz for reducing interference and providing a stronger, more stable signal. Enjoy fast and uninterrupted wireless connectivity, whether you are streaming videos, gaming, or working. WPA2 Network Security Features encrypting all data transmitted over the wireless network and ensuring you with peace of mind that the wireless network is secure, private, and protected against any unauthorized access and intrusion. Easy Setup & Use An ideal choice for fast and reliable internet connectivity without the hassle of complicated setup and configuration. Allows users to quickly and easily get their router running with concise web management. Optional LED Indicator The smart signal indicator provides you with real-time information about the internet's connectivity, making it easy to identify and get a grip on the router's status. You can choose to turn it on/off on the webpage. User-friendly Non-slip Pads These pads ensure that the router stays securely in place, preventing it from accidentally falling or slipping, which may damage the router or interfere with its operation, even on some slippery or uneven surfaces. Practical & Aesthetically Pleasing Sleek and modern look that blends seamlessly into home or office, making it stylish and functional decor for any space. The compact and lightweight design allows it to be placed or moved around easily as needed.

Dual Band Router(2.4GHz and 5GHz) with 1000Mbps WAN/LAN Gigabit Ethernet Port The 2.4GHz band handles tasks such as email or web browsing,the 5GHz band handles intensive tasks such as online gaming,4K video streaming,or large file transfers.
More than 64 devices can be connected at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it. My devices stay connected. A new device was easy to connect. For the purpose I bought it for it is great. The web site on the other hand needs to be worked on. I never could get it to take me where I needed to go. Only by accident did I get the device installed. I have built my own web site and I know how one is suppose to work. If it takes more than 3 clicks to get where you need to be, it is too difficult for the average user. Fix the web site and it will be a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Wavlink Router set up was simple with the setup wizard I am using this router at the client end of an ORPEY wifi bridge 400 feet out from the ip base with high winds always. The performance is excellent with no lag on my apple TV and/or laptop. Conductivity is continuous. I am no longer having the internet dropping off. The 5g 2.4g and Lan all have full band. I would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2020
reviews.reviewText: First the bad news, I cannot use port forwarding, even though the feature is in the admin page. I've tried resetting the router, and also double-checked the settings. It's turned on, the port forwarding just refuses to work. If you're gonna run a server or are a gamer then you may want to look for a different router unless you use this in LAN bridge mode with another router that supports port forwarding (as an extender).ANother downside, the ethernet ports for internal use on the back only provided me 10 or so MB/s, they're low quality. However the port for actual Internet hookup works well. I've gotten 300 KB/s tops for speed on 5 G wifi.A good thing is this router can also act as a wireless repeater/extender, and it works well when doing so, even if I only get 65 Mbps on average while using the extended signal, it covers the backyard and areas of my house while my main router at the front does not.Over all I'm giving this 4 stars, because if you're just a non-tech savvy person and need a good wifi network this is for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: pros-Cheap at less than $60-1gb ethernet ports-Some features found in bigger brandscons-Literally trash wifi connection, you can be right next to it and the signal would disconnect-Ai Mesh is slow on this device and only works with other Wavlink devices-2 ethernet ports only-Ap mode, doesnt work, a lot of features just don't work or they bug out if you try enabling*remarks* Stay away from this brand it's literally trash, including the outside mesh devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ignore the bad reviews
reviews.reviewText: I read the bad reviews and as you would expect the reviews are complaints from people that should never try to do this themselves. Ignorance is not a bad product make.I am a professional and I have installed these in many places with no complaints. The signal strength actually outpowers my professional Cisco router. It is simple to set up but as I always say, DO NOT INSTALL THE DISKS THAT COME WITH PRODUCTS. that is how you get problems. Just log in and use the web interface on the router to set it up. It will walk you through. I have these running on many of my networks. If done properly this router will out perform your expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well
reviews.reviewText: It reaches from inside my home to inside my workshop about 100 ft away.Very good strong signal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Installation instructions Suck!
reviews.reviewText: Manual wants you to download some third party router access BS. Wavlink web site is no longer available. Can’t access the set up features. Other than all that, seems to work fine, for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of features
reviews.reviewText: Lots of setup features.Good WiFi signal.I’m using it as an access point (AP) to add WiFi6 to my network.

Well, I was having trouble getting a steady signal from my internet provider router because it was located in one of the rooms where the internet port was located, so I had to look for a modem that could help in relaying the signal across the apartment. This modem ticked all the boxes, including ease of installation, signal strength, and a reasonable price tag. After initial set up, I did though encounter a single anomaly where I was unable to connect to it, probably conflict of IP address issue with Internet provider router, but eventually with a quick troubleshooting using the manual by restarting the modem, everything returned to normal. I highly recommend it if you are looking for a reasonably priced router to boost your internt across your residence
Lost our last router which was a 4 year old Netcomm in a lightening strike, bought this as a replacement.. Easy to install and has improved wifi coverage by about 50%. I wish I'd bought one earlier
This router is one of the best and cheap ones out there
Easy too set up great value
